data.text:
Came here for Iftar and the food was very good and fresh. The selection was decent so very less wastage. The place was not very busy  unlike Iftar place during holy month. They have valet parking, please staffs and good ambience. I don’t mind coming here again.
The only negative is the Reastarant is not responsive when you call them and I had to escalate to Jaqueline
data.title: Good place for Iftar

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Vivekbairoliya,

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor! We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the food during Iftar and found it fresh with a decent selection, minimizing wastage. We're also glad to know that you appreciated the peaceful atmosphere, valet parking service, and pleasant ambiance.

We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with the responsiveness of our restaurant colleagues when you called. Your feedback is valuable to us, and we will address this issue promptly to ensure a better experience for our guests in the future. We appreciate your patience and understanding in this matter.

We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another enjoyable dining experience!

Sincierley,

Freddie Mourad
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Freddie Mourad

data.text:
Winnie front office was welcoming and helpfull 

During breakfast i also got two very supportive staff Winnie the barrister and Hnin who were always at my service and ever smilling

The Irish bar was also perfect with very amazing staff unfortunately cant remember the names

In summary i enjoyed my stay
data.title: Amazing Experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear PhillipkB88OUY,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us on TripAdvisor. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our team members made your time here memorable.

Winnie at the front office, along with our breakfast colleague Winnie and Hnin, are truly valued members of our team, and it's wonderful to hear that they provided you with welcoming and attentive service. We'll be sure to pass along your kind words to them.

We're thrilled that you also enjoyed your time at our Irish bar, we assure you that we'll recognize them for their amazing service.

Once again, thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the future.

Best Regards,

Freddie Mourad
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Freddie Mourad

data.text:
I am a long stay guest at this hotel - I cannot praise it enough! All the amenities are always clean and all staff members are so friendly. It’s a great location for Dubai - everywhere is around 20 minutes away. 

The room itself is cleaned so thoroughly and efficiently. The pool is lovely and has a bar where you can get coffee/smoothies/drinks. There is also a pub within the hotel - there is everything you need here. 

A particular shout out goes to Winnie who works at the coffee shop downstairs - always so friendly and makes the best coffee!
data.title: Great facilities, lovely staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Tia654,

Thank you for your wonderful review and for choosing to stay with us for long stay , We're thrilled to hear that you've had such a positive experience at our hotel.

It's fantastic to know that you find all our amenities clean and that our colleagues members are always friendly. We strive to create a welcoming environment for all our guests.

We're glad that our location has been convenient for you to explore Dubai, and we appreciate your feedback on the cleanliness and efficiency of our rooms. The Pool Bar area sounds like a delightful spot to relax, and we're happy you found it enjoyable.

We'll be sure to pass along your special shout out to Winnie at Cafe Verde , It's great to hear that she made your experience even better with her friendly service and excellent coffee-making skills.

Thank you once again for your kind words and for your continued support. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more enjoyable stays!

Best Regards,

Freddie Mourad
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Freddie Mourad

data.text: My stay at Holiday inn & suits was fantastic. The service was top-notch, with supportive staff spacial Thanks to Mr. Alex F/O and Ms.Aman(sorry I forget the name)from kitchen 25. The room was stunning, offering a comfortable and luxurious retreat. Highly recommend this hotel for an exceptional experience.
data.title: Outstanding Service & Luxurious Accommodation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 661tariquea,

Thank you so much for sharing your fantastic experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that your stay at Holiday Inn & Suites Dubai Science Park was fantastic. Our team takes great pride in providing top-notch service, and we're delighted that Alexey at the Front Office and Aman from Kitchen 25 made your stay even more special. Your kind words mean a lot to us.

It's wonderful to know that you found your room stunning and that it provided a comfortable and luxurious retreat for you. Your recommendation of our hotel for an exceptional experience is greatly appreciated.

We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another memorable stay in the future!

Sincerely,

Freddie Mourad
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Freddie Mourad

data.text:
We had very good Iftar.
Food was so delicious with wide variety of Arabic and international dishes.
The staff was very friendly and welcoming especially Ms. Aman .
The place is so organized with great atmosphere.
Definitely will visit it again.
data.title: Great experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 796futurel,

Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. It's something our colleagues takes great pride in, so we value your feedback. We hope you will visit us again. 

Sincerely,

Freddie Mourad
Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Freddie Mourad
